tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MOVING_AVERAGE (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE TREND_ANALYSIS (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  trend VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TIME_SERIES_DATA (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE WINDOW_FUNCTION (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  window_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE BIG_DATA_APPLICATION (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data JSONB
)
